title: Create New Table Change Alert
subTitle: Use this form to add a new table change alert to the system.

formMessages.postError: There was an error saving the table change alert.
formMessages.updateError: There was an error updating the table change alert.

status.label: Status
status.description: Indicates the current state of the table change alert. Reflects the operational status within the system.

name.label: Name
name.description: A unique identifier for the table change alert. This name helps in easily referencing and managing the alert.

databaseAction.label: Database Action
databaseAction.description: Specifies the type of database operation that triggers the alert.

source.label: Source
source.description: Identifies the origin or the data source for the table change alert, such as a specific database or data stream.

topic.label: Topic
topic.description: Defines the main subject or the table name associated with the alert. This field usually aligns with the specific table being monitored.

table.label: Table
table.description: The exact name of the database table to which the alert is attached. Changes in this table trigger the alert.

description.label: Description
description.description: A detailed explanation of the table change alert's purpose, scope, and any relevant details. This helps users understand the alert's context.

emailProfile.label: Email Profile
emailProfile.description: Refers to the configured email settings profile used for sending out the alerts. This includes sender information and SMTP settings.

emailRecipients.label: Email Recipients
emailRecipients.description: A list of email addresses, separated by commas, that will receive notifications. These recipients are alerted upon the specified database action.

effectiveDate.label: Effective Date
effectiveDate.description: The start date from which the table change alert becomes active.

expirationDate.label: Expiration Date
expirationDate.description: The date after which the table change alert becomes inactive.
